message:
Hello,
I am Mostafa, 15 Years Old, I learned everything about Windows, Microsoft and Office Applications. I also learned HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and jQuery.

I am learning C#, what is your recommendations for me, because I am still young and I would love to hear advises from other experienced geeks!

Thanks in Advance!

data.message: مش فكرة انى اتعلم كل حاجه فى كل حته ,, العلم و انك تتعلم اكيد كويس ,, بس زي ما بيقولو قليل ينفع خير من كثير لا ينفع ,, انت بالـ html و الـ css و الـ javascript انت كدا معاك كل حاجه ممكن تبدأ بيها مجال الfront end developer ,, الفكرة بقى انت حابب ايه و حابب تروح فين !
أنا أتصور انه مش بيتكلم من ناحية شغل ..... Ahmed Tawfik ..... هو عايز يتعلم حاجة جديدة ...... هو أكيد مش بيدور علي شغل ..... و الله أعلم
Trend is mobile mostafa :) Go Mobile and good luck
You can try cross platform mobile development, server side js (nodejs), or if you want to learn C# you can start with web api to make rest services

وأكملك لو معاك ال html, css, javascript ممكن تبدأ في أي حاجه موبايل (شوف http://cordova.apache.org وفيه حوالي عشرين بلاتفورم كمان نفس القصة) و ممكن تبقي back end developer أد الدنيا لو طلعت ل node.js مش هتحتاج حاجه تانية. ويا سلام لو فيه داتا بيز علي جمب أي حاجه تربط مع ال services اللي هتعملها ب node.

انت بتحب الويب - الديسكتوب  - الموبايل  - الجيمز 
شوف انت حابب مجال ايه وادخل فيه وركز فيه اوى على قد ما تقدر
Ahmed Tawfik انا لسه صغير فعاوز اتعلم حاجات كتير واشوف ايه اللي اكمل فيه فمستقبلي ده غير انه اتقلي ان لغات الweb designing ملهاش مستقبل قد مافي مستقبل للمبرمجين بc#  و Javascript
Mostafa Mohsen Gaafar what are rest services?
JavaScript leha mosta2bal kebir awy, it runs on all pcs and mobiles and can build cross platform apps

اراء كلها اراء ,, المهم انك اتكون متميز فى اي الحته انت هتكون موجود فيها فارق فى الحته اللى انت فيها ,, اي كانت هى ايه و مفيش حاجه فى المجال بتاعنا دا اسمها ملهاش مستقبل :D لأن مجالنا دا كلو اصلا هو المستقبل
ربنا يوفقك
Rest services are the current standard to send data over http, by ajax
Mostafa Mohsen Gaafar (Y)
Ahmed Tawfik اكيد شكرا جزيلا على النصيحة
Mostafa Elgayar  http://www.infoworld.com/ ده هيخليك على دراية باللى بيحصل فى مجالنا عموما .... و ايه احدث الافكار و المشاريع ......
Mostafa Mohsen GaafarI just started learning c# a few days ago. Do you think Java Script is better, should I shift to it? What do you recommend?
Taher Abdelmohsen Bookmarked =D
Mohammed Hussien I think I should concentrate on Desktop, then think about mobile... Or am I wrong?
Ahmed Ezz El-Din انا حبص بصه على ده واشوفه Seems Interesting =D

حاول تشوف الجوريزم ومبادئ البرمجة نفسها 
عشان تقدر تخليك تشوف حلول للمشاكل اي كانت لغة البرمجة الي هتستخدمها ;)

I don't want to compare C# to JS they are very different. But C# runs on Windows only while JS is supported almost on all devices. You can try some C# to find what you prefer yourself. Anyway, I'm impressed by your experience at your age and I wish you luck :)

Maged Elgazzar The book I am learning from teaches the fundamentals of programming, then at the end teaches the basics of c#, so this book will teach me the logic of programming, then I can see if I should head to C# or Javascript... Mostafa Mohsen Gaafar Thanks tho =D

I like your passion on learning but Don't you ever say this word "I learned everything" AGAIN :) My advice will be not depending on a platform. If you feel you are good in Math I will strongly recommend "Machine Learning" with a lot of information out there in the world it's time to process it and make use of it. and this is where Machine Learning comes in! 

https://www.coursera.org/course/ml

Mohamed Alaa El Din Thanks for the advice, everything is infinite I know, nobody knows everything... I will take a look at this course, I like maths, and it would be more fun when it is related to something I love more which is computer... So thanks for the recommendation, I will surely take it under consideration.

Mostafa Elgayar My advice, learn Algorithms and a language like Python. Become very good at solving problems programmatically and with Python you can get a free IDE and free web server and build anything you like, Also being good at Algorithms will make any platform/Language easier to learn. You are still young so enjoy the fun part of programming to it's fullest first.  Python is a great place to get started and look up courses at Coursera on Algorithms,
